text: This will be pretty big imo, what do you think?  <@U01QVR44MEY> <@UJAPS2K4N> <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/breaking-change-expanded-filtering-capabilities-and-error-messaging-in-HubSpots-search-api>

Yeah it is a pretty nice change but if I thought they rolled back that change after about a week. Maybe they rerolled it out? It’s definitely a big deal for anyone who doesn’t want to / can’t use GraphQL

I saw that you originally saw this a while back - and yes they did roll it back then - but this is currently on the Developer Change Log as upcoming so I think it will happen.  FYI: I have not yet watched your recent DevHug re GraphQL but I am excited to do so later today.
Got it yeah I was like I’m pretty sure this exact same thing dropped a while ago, thanks for the confirmation! Have you tested it on any of the search apis yet? Thanks man!
it won't be active until August 26th
